My Projects

Here are some recent projects that showcase a range of my skills and interests. A general description of their intended purpose, technologies and languages used, and a link to the Github repository is included.

Read My Resume Contact Me


Hiking Database

A hiking database tracking hiker, hike, park, trail, and camping entries with CRUD operations, using NodeJS, MariaDB, SQL.

August 2018

Sock Search Game

A text-based C++ game in which the player must find their missing socks that are hidden in randomly assigned locations.

June 2018

Bin Packing Solver

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

9 mins

Hiking Database

Node.js, MariaDB, SQL, phpMyAdmin, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

This database tracks hikers, hikes, parks, trails, and camping entries. Users can enter in data such as hike weather, length, ascent, and temperature, all tracked with unique IDs. Relationships between entities have been defined (e.g. there is a many-to-many relationship between hikers and hikes).

Github Repository

Sock Search Game

C++

This game was designed with pointer-linked room spaces using object-oriented programming concepts. The player can navigate from room to room, searching objects and spaces for their missing socks, by typing options into the terminal. Room and sock locations and randomly generated each game, which has a 100 step limit.

Github Repository
